ingredients.item: Few drops Cooks' Ingredients Peppermint Natural Extract
Few drops essential Waitrose Natural Green Food Colour

instructions.step: Prepare the martini glass by dipping the rim into the melted dark chocolate and chilling it in the fridge until it sets.

Stir all the ingredients (except the garnishes) together in a cocktail shaker, fill with ice and shake for about 10 seconds until chilled. Strain into the chilled martini glass, float the chocolate button on top and enjoy.
